item.title: Work Journal: March 31st
item.description: I want to share more what I do every day, so I’m starting this journal after inspiration from Adam Wathan. Love what the guy is doing so I will do something similar. This week started off very well with the public launch of the waiting list for my upcoming Online Workshop about “Geospatial Data Visualization with d3”. And I’m thrilled with the result. This encourages me to start on this rather sooner than later and is kind of a bummer that I did not do this earlier.
